text: -  External radiation therapy and/or internal radiation therapy with or without surgery.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before surgery or radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy after surgery or other cancer treatment.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and radiation therapy.
